thread.title: InventHelp Client Device Allows For More Convenient Mounting of TVs, Tablet PCs and Computer Monitors (NJD-886)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Client Device Allows For More Convenient Mounting of TVs, Tablet PCs and Computer Monitors (NJD-886) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Client Device Allows For More Convenient Mounting of TVs, Tablet PCs and Computer Monitors (NJD-886)
text:
Pittsburgh-based InventHelp is working to submit the EZ TOTAL MOTION to companies for their review.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) September 24, 2015
Conventional wall brackets donâ€™t allow for much adjustment of the placement of TVs, tablet PCs and computer monitors, so an inventor from Hackensack, N.J., designed a better way of mounting such items.
The EZ TOTAL MOTION enables a user to mount a TV, tablet PC, cell phones and many other devices more conveniently. It saves space and avoids the hassle of wall corners. Easy to use and adjust, it's producible in design variations.
The original design was submitted to the New Jersey office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-NJD-886, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
